prompts: Create an ice-type Pokemon resembling a majestic bird with shimmering blue feathers.
I want a legendary Pokemon known for its elegance and icy abilities, soaring high in the skies.
Generate a Pokemon that embodies the essence of winter, with long wings and a graceful stance.
Make a mythical creature that blends shades of blue and white, showcasing its cold, serene nature.
Imagine an iconic Pokemon with a regal appearance, surrounded by frosty winds and ethereal beauty.
Design a Pokemon that has a sleek body and powerful wings, ready to glide through snowy mountains.
Show me a legendary bird Pokemon that commands the winter storms with its icy breath.
